revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Galar Mine No. 2 |image = [[File:Galar Mine No. 2.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Galar Mine No. 2. |tokens = 1,430,000 |location = South of Hulbury }} '''Galar Mine No. 2''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 21,294,640 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
